title: Build an Array With Stack Operations
content:
Given an array  and an integer . In each iteration, you will read a number from  .
Build the  array using the following operations:

Push: Read a new element from the beginning , and push it in the array.
Pop: delete the last element of the array.
If the target array is already built, stop reading more elements.

You are guaranteed that the target array is strictly increasing, only containing numbers between 1 to  inclusive.
Return the operations to build the target array.
You are guaranteed that the answer is unique.
 








 





 is strictly increasing.
